Backend Engineer

CloudTech Inc.

Remote (US Only)

Job Type: Full-Time

Salary Range: $140,000 - $180,000

Experience Level: Mid-Senior Level

About the Role

We're looking for a talented Backend Engineer to help us build and scale our cloud infrastructure. You'll work on distributed systems that process billions of events per day.

Responsibilities

  • Design and implement scalable backend services using Go and Python
  • Build and maintain microservices architecture
  • Work with databases including PostgreSQL, Redis, and Elasticsearch
  • Implement monitoring, logging, and alerting systems
  • Collaborate with frontend teams to design APIs

Requirements

  • 3+ years of backend development experience
  • Proficiency in Go, Python, or Java
  • Experience with distributed systems and microservices
  • Strong knowledge of database design and optimization
  • Experience with cloud platforms (AWS or GCP)
  • Excellent problem-solving skills

Nice to Have

  • Experience with Kubernetes and Docker
  • Knowledge of message queues (Kafka, RabbitMQ)
  • Experience with monitoring tools (Prometheus, Grafana)
  • Open source contributions

Benefits

  • Competitive salary and equity
  • Comprehensive health insurance
  • Flexible PTO policy
  • Remote work options
  • Professional development budget
